duties_responsibilities.duty: Responsible for all functions of the restaurant including guest relations, supervision, staffing, safety, and quality.
Plan and direct all restaurant operations and maintain high standards of food, beverage, and service.
Create and implement SOPs, assure all standards are followed, and manage the restaurant's financial goals.
Manage inventory, cost control, and administrative procedures.
Lead, communicate, train, and develop staff, while maintaining a customer service focus.
Work ten-hour shifts as needed, including weekends and holidays.

education_certification.credential: Minimum 4 years as a manager in a full-service restaurant with night club experience as a plus
